  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 </div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="81391" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="81391" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.16</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1013">1,013</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="164"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Coach Green</b> by <b>Coach</b> is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Coach Green</b> was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Kiwi and Bergamot; middle notes are Rosemary and Geranium; base notes are Cedar and Moss. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="81391"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.178.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Kiwi-178.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Kiwi</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.9309550323503; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 3.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.90728327058369; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.49.jpg" style="width: 3.35rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rosemary-49.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Rosemary</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.21.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Geranium-21.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Geranium</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.8594681029756; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.41.jpg" style="width: 3.075rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cedar-41.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cedar</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.83555498052084; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.39.jpg" style="width: 2.95rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Oakmoss-39.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Moss</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="81391"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='a0175350107fe81e70c660bb51357669667' slotpayload='{"ct":"OBcCEo3N9cDPVktvx+yM6rORQxNWM6fCN+LmlfjzjxYLqr\/y0JTEgGOetLNqjDDD7DWIMN6g7ak53eIJ7XSbOd7oRuI6t8B3SHH4spuSVYOSQNL2T1o5H5LLJov03nfxvqCvgJrAlZiT+dI2Kc0PkSkssGpdrdMSdSeU3S8qjG+fFgkdoLRvZq7BiwsWM7bJIz5xtus\/tzfAQK4BAk8kB16gh55OVsKqfwlvV2LpbV7\/vUECj18Jqn6YUGOpwG69mhiwU58n54C7eO0zXxrxhPT7I4PK6+blcc1ArsnpjJI=","iv":"fbeb69f99ede9b7eaa2b42a3fcf28bb0","s":"4b81ff8845000b16"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2367678" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367678" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrPhickYou"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2308594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2308594.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrPhickYou" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367678ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367678" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2308594">MrPhickYou</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 19:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i loved this scent when i first smelled coach green, i don't hate it, but after getting into more fragrances i realize that i could have used my money for something better.<br />
it has a bright fresh, fruity, and mainly kiwi scent. it smells really good for what it's trying to accomplish.<br />
what disappoints me most is its projection/sillage and how long it lasts.<br />
it cannot project well, almost at all, and it goes away so quickly that you will forget if you've put on a fragrance.<br />
i don't think i would want to convince somebody to buy this when there are so many other fresh/fruity fragrances on the market that are cheaper and stronger than this one.<br />
<br />
<br />
kiwi taste good but burn my tungue ;(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2367678"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2367678#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361884" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361884" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afrikano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afrikano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361884ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361884" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290419">Afrikano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-26">11/26/24 08:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a full bottle for under $30 and for that price this is amazing. Reminds me of a fruitier take on Prada Carbon, fresh clean and easy to wear. Very hard to dislike this but probably redundant for people who already have a a lot clean/fresh fragrances in their collection. Still great to me though</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2361884"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2361884#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339896" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2339896" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="robbisniffs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2306598"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2306598.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="robbisniffs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2339896ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2339896" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2306598">robbisniffs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 09:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Picked up coach green online for a cheap price and for the price this fragrance is GREAT. Wanted to get this as a fresh cheap scent for the gym and this hits the spot. Super fresh with moderate longevity and sillage, but for the price its really good. The bottle is also pretty nice with a decent atomizer. Overall I'd give it a 7.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2339896"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2339896#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335921" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335921" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vk0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vk0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Afnan/9pm-65414.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65414.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="9pm"title="9pm"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335921ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335921" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171368">vk0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 14:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impression a few months back: Has a wonderful freshness to it and is not too strong either, and so Im thinking of getting it and making it my daily fragrance for the first month of my next university year (before I go back to The Most Wanted in the colder months). <br />
<br />
Notes as of 2.11.2024: Green, fruity, woody, a slight spiciness to it, light yet has an underlying depth too (earthy?). The kiwi note works very well. I think that this is too fresh and fruity to use in the winter, and on a typical autumn day I wouldnt use this either, but where I am the autumn season this year seems to have a lot of days of fair weather, and even sunny at times, so I think this works perfectly. While I don't think this fragrance is bold enough to fall under the typical 'club fragrances' category, I can see this being used on particular nights out. After drying out, the wood notes come to the surface more and mingles very well with the mix of fresh, fruity, and spicy notes that are already there. While I usually am not fond of lidless bottles, nor of tabs and labels hanging off of things, I think this bottle is amazing, and exudes a unique elegance to it. <br />
<br />
This is not meant to be a review, just a personal record</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2335921"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2335921#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325517" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GavinRoda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689285"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1689285.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GavinRoda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325517ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325517" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689285">GavinRoda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 19:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has been my signature scent for over a year. I absolutely love it. <br />
<br />
It is a versatile, fresh, fruity fragrance. The kiwi absolutely shines in the opening, and stands out from any fragrance I have found. Once it dries down, it has a very natural, light, and fresh scent. <br />
<br />
Some compare this to Sauvage, which I also have, and I have to disagree. This is much more unique thanks to the kiwi note. I find this much more pleasing. Simply an easy fragrance to wear for any season and any occasion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2325517"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2325517#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2323658" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323658" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katong_guy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464185"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="katong_guy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323658ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323658" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464185">katong_guy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 06:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Probably the best fragrance for a tropical city like Singapore. Has a cooling effect mentally on you and those around you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2323658"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2323658#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321890" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321890" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bendoriot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bendoriot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321890ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321890" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); Bought it for summer and it was my daily all summer. It gets a little boring, and I think the dry down is nothing special, but it has me feeling good and summery. Would recommend for GOATS only</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2321890"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2321890#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319347" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2319347" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HMD24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108815"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="HMD24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/L-Homme-Ultime-35659.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35659.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme Ultime"title="L'Homme Ultime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2319347ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2319347" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2108815">HMD24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 21:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this! Uplifting, fresh, and clean scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2319347"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2319347#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317665" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoirRGV"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1265196.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoirRGV" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317665ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317665" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265196">NoirRGV</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 10:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love freshies but as a man, I don't want to smell like kiwi. Not a bad fragrance but nothing special.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2317665"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2317665#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2316878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316878" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yungmuny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2140007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2140007.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yungmuny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Eau-de-Parfum-84094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"title="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2140007">yungmuny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach Green opens up with a natural juicy kiwi and bergamot as it sits on top of a soapy-like bed of rosemary and geranium. I absolutely love this stuff, and the accuracy of the kiwi note is really appealing to me, it's not like an overly sweet artificial kiwi candy but rather the freshness of the fruit really compliments that soap like heart. after about 15-20 minutes the kiwi note takes a step back and you get that like designer freshness that I think is coming from the rosemary and geranium, it smells great and with that hint of kiwi in the background you get a nice unique freshie. The dry down is what makes this fragrance for me, besides a unique opening and a in offensive heart the winter woody base comes out around the 12-hour mark. Surprisingly fit for winter, opposite to its fresh opening the Cedar and Oakmoss almost tap dance across the opening as it dries down and I found that this allows me to wear it in cool weather and at night. Now there are 2 problems with this fragrance and the longevity/projection and the atomizer. it lasts max 6 hours and only projects for about 4 becoming a skin scent after that, this causes me to overspray the shit outta it and I'm about halfway done with my 1.3 oz in 2 months. The second and probably the most frustrating is the damn atomizer on this. It's one of those twist to lock ones and its dog shit, its hard as hell to press down on and it does the like single line squirt thing unless you press the shit outta it and even when you do its still sub-par (and absolutely infuriating) compared to others. I have like a 5 ml decant sample thing that I transferred coach green into, and I definitely recommend doing so. It's just a shame considering how beautiful the bottle is. <br />
<br />
TLDR; Coach Green opens up with a beautiful natural Kiwi note that turns into a fresh soapy fragrance and once it dries down a cold weather like woody accord comes through. 6 outta 10 regarding longevity and the atomizer is by far the worst thing about this. I got it on sale from Aurafragrance and definitely worth it if you can grab it for cheap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2316878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2316878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2316762" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316762" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wee keavo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114814"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2114814.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wee keavo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316762ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316762" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114814">Wee keavo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 13:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like pdm greenly. Very good daily fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2316762"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2316762#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312396" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312396" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance_Nolan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance_Nolan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312396ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312396" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453">Fragrance_Nolan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 12:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simply a spicy fresh scent that has hints of kiwi and citrus, it smells very green. I can definitely see the similarities between Green Coach and PDM Greenley, which I used to own a full bottle of. Hilariously I might actually prefer the Coach over PDM. Green Coach doesn't smell too cheap to me at all, it actually smells pretty quality. The scent is very pleasant and it's something I am probably going to pick up when it starts warming up outside. Not taking the performance into account, the scent is an easy 9/10. I wish more designers had offerings like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2312396"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2312396#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311768" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shadymonk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1522415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shadymonk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Colonia-Quercia-38674.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38674.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colonia Quercia"title="Colonia Quercia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311768ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311768" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1522415">Shadymonk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 21:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The fresh  opening which is amazing  lasts for about 5 mins. After that it's just a linear geranium bomb. It does smell similar to greenely. I love greenely. I like green. If the opening of green lasted through out its 5 hour life then green would be a love</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2311768"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2311768#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308836" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308836" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="owenhabs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2249524"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="owenhabs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308836ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308836" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2249524">owenhabs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 08:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stuff is so good I had to get 2 bottles of it, one of the best cheapies if you can find it for under 40 imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2308836"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2308836#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307681" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2307681" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cmor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896928"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cmor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Parfum-8282.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8282.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermes Parfum"title="Terre d'Hermes Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2307681ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2307681" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896928">cmor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 07:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sampled this from a department store, so I have no comments on what this is like after longer-term ownership. That said, the Kiwi note has real presence, and is a unique note on top of that. It's use alone is commendable, and to pair it with rosemary underneath makes for a nicely aromatic and fresh smell. It's nice, straightforwardly fresh-smelling. I have a small hope that it catches on well enough to stick around, but not so well that everyone starts wearing it, because this fragrance is like completing an obstacle course out-of-order: It gets to the same spot as many other green, fresh smells, but does so with a slightly different set of tools. The appeal lies in that, not the end result, and if everyone does it, that appeal fades.<br />
<br />
That said, it does not last very long *at all.* Gone within 3 hours, after a spritz. Additionally, while the bottle is appealing and quite pretty, the atomizer is AWFUL. Cheap, wobbly little thing without a cap. <br />
<br />
All in all, this is an excellent option for an outing in the late spring or summer, sometime when it's warm. Perhaps a date, or a daytime meeting with friends or a co-worker. It doesn't last long enough for all-day wear at a workplace, and its light freshness would get overpowered in cooler weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2307681"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2307681#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307520" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2307520" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="martomomchilov"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1529550"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1529550.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="martomomchilov" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2307520ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2307520" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1529550">martomomchilov</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-07">10/07/24 03:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kiwi Soapy opening , drying down to Dior Sauvage<br />
a little different but similar to Dior <br />
<br />
Longevity - average (2 hours) for EDT: I hope after maceration to get up to 4 hours <br />
I got 60ml for 25 euro , I falled for the idea of having it - nothing groundbreaking , atomizer super bad<br />
Very versatile everyday fragrance , pleasant &amp; aromatic <br />
Will not buy it again - im coming from more complex designer fragrance so this is just filler in my collection.<br />
<br />
Overall 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2307520"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2307520#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306773" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306773" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nick-Euphonia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271678"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2271678.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nick-Euphonia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-L-Intense-49416.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49416.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme Idal L'Intense"title="L'Homme Idal L'Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306773ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306773" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271678">Nick-Euphonia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All these recent Coach releases are very good from what I've smelled. Even the juices I've smelled from the female side, are very nice and well-crafted.<br />
<br />
From this opening, I don't get kiwi, but I get a sort of honeydew and citrus pith with super fresh clean soap smell. There is a pleasant, soft, mildly sweet greenness that cuts all the way through this.  Normally "soapy" is not something I like but this is not at all synthetic or harsh, it's very soft and round.<br />
<br />
Haven't finished wearing it yet, but projection is solid, and longevity seems par for the course for a designer EDT, seems like it'll last 4 or more hours. Unbeatable freshie for the price. Will definitely be picking up a bottle. Scent is 7.5/10. Factoring in strength and price point, I'm giving it over all, an 8.25/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2306773"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2306773#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298221" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I am reaching for this bottle all the time. The projection is average but who cares as long as I can smell this on my skin Im happy. It is so uplifting</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2276233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2276233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271939" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NC0808"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1996404.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NC0808" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Haramain-Perfumes/Amber-Oud-Gold-Edition-51816.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51816.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Oud Gold Edition"title="Amber Oud Gold Edition"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271939ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271939" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996404">NC0808</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 20:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really enjoy this stuff. When I smelt it at Macy's I instantly knew what my next pickup was. the kiwi note is amazing and it's a fruity fresh frag. I totally would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a good summer. in my opinion it's the best in the coach line with no competition. As for the longevity ad projection, I found that the projection is actually pretty good but the longevity is lacking. I think this is good for a trip to the mall or some place where you will be out 3-4 hours. what im getting at is that this won't last you through a work or school day but when you can smell it it kicks ass<br />
smell 9/10 <br />
projection 7/10<br />
longevity 5/10<br />
I would totally recommend this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2271939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2271939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206486">thejermblackwell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 15:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Idk. Wanted to like this one so bad, but all I smell is generic shower gel or Irish Spring. Such a cool bottle tho. Disappointing<br />
<br />
Isn't really similar to Sauvage at all in my opinion, no idea where that comes from</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2257706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2257706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255890" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255890" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tbellinger99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2143078"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2143078.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tbellinger99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255890ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255890" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); Beautiful burst of kiwi and citrus in the opening and stunning drydown! Not an offensive scent so you don't have to worry about choking people out with this one. Perfect option if you want something that is mass-appealing, but also makes you stand out from everyone else.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2255890"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2255890#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253007" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Woody. Does remind me of Sauvage especially when it fades after time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2203818"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2203818#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2202058" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stinkycomrade"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1522197"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stinkycomrade" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2202058ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2202058" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1522197">Stinkycomrade</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-28">06/28/24 09:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can see the argument for saying this is like sauvage, but those green notes, for me, put it in a completely different category. If smell this on someone, Im not going to say oh wow sauvage, Im going to pick up that fresher, greener vibe. I like this over sauvage just for the simple fact that everyone is wearing blue freshies, no one is really wearing green fragrances or fragrances with a green twist. Further yet, I recommend layering it with Gucci Guilty if you own both bottles</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2202058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2202058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198537" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SaintLaurent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1105141"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1105141.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SaintLaurent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Born-to-be-Unforgettable-89141.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89141.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Born to be Unforgettable"title="Born to be Unforgettable"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198537ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198537" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1105141">SaintLaurent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 18:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly: This IS Sauvage EdT with less sillage / longevity / presence, but a more fruity Kiwi Vibe to it. Which really works well tho! It is unique enough so I instantly know what I'm smelling, but to a person who does know sauvage, no question, this person will think of Sauvage at first.<br />
<br />
Let's just call it a fruity summer Version of sauvage. It's really nice to have tho, as it is super enjoyable to  almost everybody, but also a tad unique given the Kiwi note.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2198537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2198537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198530" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sidalwayssmellsgood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001234"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2001234.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sidalwayssmellsgood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001234">sidalwayssmellsgood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 18:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is underrated, and I know why. Full disclaimer: this is extremely different from the usual Sauvage-like DNA.<br />
<br />
Sweet, green, sumptuous: imagine going on a trek into a hilly wilderness. You dont want to attract the bees, you want to wear something safe, and you want to smell a little people-pleasing in case your trek buddies are sensitive to smell. <br />
<br />
This is an extremely well-rounded fragrance. And for the price you get it at, it is as good a deal as any Cool Water you can get your hands on while also smelling different in the dry-down. It doesnt last too long, but it does well enough for its price. Id suggest re-applying this over and over again if need be.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2198530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2198530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
