A splash of Kiwi. Have you ever smelled a Kiwi? I can't say it has a scent. This is a nice scent but it's anything but sweet. Sort of a green herbal geranium type with little citrus. It really just smells like everything else. But if the price is right, it's a good buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2170735"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2170735#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2166787" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2166787" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="solsisod"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1846668"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1846668.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="solsisod" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Ralph-s-Club-68282.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68282.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ralph's Club"title="Ralph's Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2166787ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2166787" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1846668">solsisod</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-24">05/24/24 13:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Might be the best smelling coach of the whole line. Fresh, juicy, aromatic. Easy to wear and a compliment getter for sure, ideal for summer wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2166787"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2166787#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2166705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2166705" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TBonetheFella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710835"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1710835.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TBonetheFella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jorum-Studio/Spiritcask-79477.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79477.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spiritcask"title="Spiritcask"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2166705ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2166705" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710835">TBonetheFella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-24">05/24/24 12:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ooo that kiwi and bergamot is really nice! (5 minutes later) oh its Dior savauge again - My initial reaction in the ulta after spraying my hand<br />
<br />
This opening is easily the best part of this fragrance. Juicy, fruity, and slightly citric kiwi and bergamot with a slight shower gel-y rosemary twinge. Then as it dries it just becomes another aromatic, savauge/Luna Rosa carbon-eque scent. Smoother than Savauge EDT, which is a nice plus.<br />
<br />
Would make a really nice summer/spring gym bag or dumb reach fragrance. Not my favorite from the house, but extremely nice for the price. <br />
<br />
Mediocre performance and projection, but cant dock it to much for the price you pay.<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2166705"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2166705#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2166485" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2166485" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="skyon33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987838"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1987838.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="skyon33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2166485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2166485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1987838">skyon33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-24">05/24/24 09:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells exactly like the average mens shower gel. <br />
I honestly don't get a distinct kiwi scent, just something slightly "sour" fruity.<br />
It doesn't smell like Dior Sauvage in my opinion, and also smells nothing like nautica voyage like the guy below me said..<br />
The performance surprised me tho. First time trying it I only had 1 spray on my wrist and it projected quite strongly for ~4h. After that it was a "strong" skin scent which was still somewhat noticeable and stayed for a couple more hours.<br />
Imo this is a very safe and versatile fragrance for every season except winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2166485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2166485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165297" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not a bad fragrance, if you buy it at discounters. Also on the dry down it smells very mossy, so its definitely not good for blind buy if you dont like mossy notes. Mass appealing, but it smells like a high quality cheap $45 fragrance. <br />
<br />
Overall: 7.9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2165297"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2165297#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2156167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2156167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151639" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trilogy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474634"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1474634.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trilogy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Eau-Sauvage-Parfum-2017-43977.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43977.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Sauvage Parfum 2017"title="Eau Sauvage Parfum 2017"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151639ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151639" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474634">Trilogy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 08:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prada Luna Rossa Carbon with a fleeting fruity note at the beginning. If you havent smelt the Prada just think a smoother version of Sauvage. If you can get this at a good price its a 100% safe blind buy that will draw lists of complements. Great for all seasons though would be wonderful for the summer. If you are looking for a good value head turning uncomplicated scent for your daily routine this would be hard to pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2151639"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2151639#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147191" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147191" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frank_yxz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249774.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frank_yxz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nicolai-Parfumeur-Createur/Eau-de-Yuzu-61362.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61362.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Yuzu"title="Eau de Yuzu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147191ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147191" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249774">frank_yxz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 04:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An amazing budget perfume for summer, although it is nothing original or unique. It is fresh, aromatic and woody.<br />
<br />
The opening is fresh and aromatic. I can get the juicy citrusy note, but I am not sure if I really get the kiwi here. Rosemary already makes its presence known in the opening with its herbal aromatic smell. As it settles on my skin, rosemary gets more and more dominant, with a slight hint of sweetness of geranium. Interestingly, geranium is more detectable when I test it on paper. In the meantime, cedar joins in the party, it brings this calming and relaxing woody vibe. The drydown remains aromatics and woody, with some earthy oakmoss in the background.<br />
<br />
In general, it is a mass appealing fragrance for summertime, and it is indeed a great budget option. It lasts 4-5 hours on my skin, but the sillage is great. I would recommend it as an office perfume for summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2147191"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2147191#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142853" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2142853" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leonnchu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898061.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leonnchu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/L-Homme-734.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.734.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme"title="L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2142853ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2142853" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898061">Leonnchu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-01">05/01/24 21:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This have a sauvage-ish dna also feels like a cousin of YSL Y but that instead of the apple, has a kiwi note which in perfumery might smell not that far away, performance is decent and this might be an alternative to those known blue fragances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874562">deja1sabel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 22:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>a freshly green and aromatic scent profile with a fun opening of a juicy and prominent kiwi. This feels cool and fresh without being an aquatic, its very distinctly a green fragrance through and through. The dry down is wonderfully earthy and grounded with hints of that fruitiness, and suprisingly this is very strong and lasts a long time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2134521" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="901RT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2094596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="901RT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coach/Open-Road-75425.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75425.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Open Road"title="Open Road"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2134521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2134521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2094596">901RT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-24">04/24/24 00:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is very unique. Its one you tend to forget but once you smell it after awhile, it draws you back in. Smells like Dior sauvage besides the kiwi. I would layer it with Dior sauvage for a better longevity and protection. You should spray ALOT of this if you want it to project and have good silage . Still worth the money and a solid purchase. Id rate it a 7.8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2134521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2134521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133811" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheFraganist55"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2029669.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheFraganist55" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029669">TheFraganist55</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach Green is a hidden gem, it smells incredible. The definition of a fresh green fragrance. Performance is meh, however, as it is with most Coach frags. It's a good price on discounters if you want a fresh fragrance for the spring and summer, just spray heavily.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2133811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2133811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131704" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But its performance is just not it, you need a good 6 spray MINIMUM with this scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2131704"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2131704#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130679" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="crisppy1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="crisppy1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842027">crisppy1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 12:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells just OK, green kiwi sweet at top with a darker base note, its woody but not smelling "like wood". Performance is just trash. Smells very little for an hour then its gone. no projection. It smells like it would be a great outdoor fragrance but outside it disappears immediately. Not worth it, even if its cheap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2130679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2130679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2129794" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="unknownpleasures"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2080356"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2080356.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="unknownpleasures" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2129794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2129794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2080356">unknownpleasures</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 13:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If I could, I'd have my money back. I just love this fragrance: it's the classic green fresh smell. Nothing new, but the kiwi gives it a nice twist and yes, I love it, but the performance... sucks. It just SUCKS. On my skin, it doesn't last more than 10 minutes. No joke, that's it on me. If I spray on the clothes, maybe gets to one hour but not more. Consider buying other stuff though this is the perfect balance you want to find in a green cologne (yeah, cologne, it performs just worse than the cheapest eau de cologne out there). Just know what are you buying: 30 sprays (literally) and it doesn't last. Won't buy it again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2129794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2129794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125549" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125549" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheClaymaker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2097769"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2097769.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheClaymaker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125549ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125549" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2097769">TheClaymaker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 11:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach Green is the definition of a budget beast. If you're on a budget and you want something that you can wear throughout spring-autumn this is the one for you. Strong Kiwi/Citrus/Woody notes of first spray. After about an hour or so, the kiwi/citrus smell fades and is a nice light woody scent. The only downside i'd say is that it doesnt have much longevity(4-6 hrs or so) Other than that its great. (Makes me feel sigma)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2125549"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2125549#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2124862" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="seansmith9322"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1750012"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="seansmith9322" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2124862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2124862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1750012">seansmith9322</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-14">04/14/24 17:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm a strong believer that your frags should only be ones that you LOVE. I can see everyone liking this but nobody loving it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2124862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2124862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2122893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2122893" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bearykind"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2093289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2093289.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bearykind" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2122893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2122893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2093289">bearykind</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-12">04/12/24 15:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the only Coach line I actually enjoy. Expect a soft, fruity kiwi aroma for the first half hour or so followed by a very well done, although somewhat generic (cannot go wrong) men's fragrance. The reason I say "somewhat" is because it is incredibly well balanced, especially with that fruity kiwi at the get-go. The scent will change from kiwi to cedar. Stays interesting. It is one of the better iterations out there. I bought it for $40, I would say that is a great deal. About halfway through the day another application will be necessary to keep it going, unless you want to put something else on for the afternoon, through the evening. If you want something to pop off, without being overwhelming, in the morning, and change to something else for the second half of the day, this is a great choice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2122893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2122893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Perfect for Spring &amp; Summer. Opens with kiwi, and ends with cedar mostly on his skin chemistry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2121467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2121467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2116058" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eliot.smelliot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2083356"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="eliot.smelliot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-IN2U-for-Him-933.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.933.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK IN2U for Him"title="CK IN2U for Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2116058ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2116058" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2083356">eliot.smelliot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-06">04/06/24 06:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think it's a great fragrance for the springtime and the summertime. If someone were to just look at the notes, they would think that it smells fruity, woody, and, like the name of the fragrance says, green. In my opinion, however, it almost smells quite metallic. (I think it gets this smell from the blast of citrus that you get once you spray it). Once the opening wears down, it smells amazing. Would recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2116058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2116058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112522" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="crlneria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1713240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="crlneria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112522ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112522" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713240">crlneria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 22:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Finally grabbed a bottle of this! Been on my radar for quite a while. There is a lot of potential for this fragrance to set a new trend in designer fragrances, and Ill explain why. Youve got almost every designer with their own version of a blue shower gel fragrance. Well, this is the ultimate green shower gel fragrance. Opening is spectacular a blast of citrusy green backed by the ever so mild kiwi note to add some sweetness. Super masculine scent, Id say perfect for spring and summer mornings. Such an energizing scent and most likely the best of the coach line. Highly recommend!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2112522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2112522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106521" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joshcolognizer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2075004"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="joshcolognizer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2075004">joshcolognizer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 23:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly surprisingly love this. Like spring twill Irish olde money - like you drive a classic Mercedes and for some reason own a castle estate. Wish the performance was better but brilliant smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2106521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2106521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2097790" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2097790"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2097790#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095077" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2095077" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceAnon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1596915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceAnon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49144.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted by Night"title="Wanted by Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2095077ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2095077" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915">FragranceAnon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-17">03/17/24 04:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is excellent. It's got a cool shaving cream vibe that makes you feel clean and dapper. The kiwi on top smells unique to me, and the oak moss that persists through the life of the fragrance keeps it masculine.<br />
<br />
I really like all four of the Coach scents that have this bottle type (Original, Platinum, Blue, Green) and would recommend them to any guy, any age. The performance of these is not super strong, but you can get them at a price on discounters that will make you comfortable spraying extra if you're so inclined.<br />
<br />
A side note: The atomizers on these things are awful... The bottles look awesome though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2095077"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2095077#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094145" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Kiwi opening doesnt last very long maybe an hour at most. However the dry down is nice and herby. Longevity is about 3-4 hours but, its relatively in expensive so spray away! For this fragrance Id recommend spraying at least 6 times. Good pick up!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2074910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2074910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066371" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2066371" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kustomeyez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1528791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kustomeyez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Elixir-71708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Elixir"title="1 Million Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2066371ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2066371" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791">Kustomeyez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 14:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For anyone wondering, (to my nose,) this smells Nothing at all like PDM Greenley. One of the shades of green in the bottle is kinda close, but scent wise,.. no way. This, in the dry down , actually resembles PDM Oajan to my nose  and a solid release if you ask me. . I say its quite versatile and easy to wear. Where it begins and where it ends ,.. are two different universes. I like it. Stats of with some energy and ends the day laid back  with some real class. Ok,,, I take it back,, it kinda resembles PDM Greenley if you dig for it and use your imagination theres a hint of it, but in no way the same. It surely does its own thing. Would Not be redundant to own both</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2066371"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2066371#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2057402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2057402" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FranLuigi97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2004280"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FranLuigi97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Costa-Azzurra-Parfum-71511.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71511.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Costa Azzurra Parfum"title="Costa Azzurra Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2057402ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2057402" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2004280">FranLuigi97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-09">02/09/24 12:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Found it horrible. It heavily reminds me to a cheap supermarket product for floor cleaning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2057402"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2057402#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049562" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ViceCity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478914"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1478914.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ViceCity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Abercrombie-Fitch/First-Instinct-37753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="First Instinct"title="First Instinct"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478914">ViceCity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-01">02/01/24 22:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening notes are superb. Then, as is unfortunately all too often the case with this brand, that first burst of freshness is not sustained. Weak longevity, within 30 min-1 hour one can expect it to begin smelling like medicine.<br />
<br />
A trial that reminded me just why I'm not buying Coach fragrances anymore, even if they remain remarkably affordable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2049562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2049562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The opening is just a very harsh kiwi that is very unique. After some time it dries down to a woody more darker kiwi.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2036764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2036764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2034088" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Does anybody else get Irish spring from it??</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2034088"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2034088#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2031250" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2031250" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lana.Dope.Rey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407630"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407630.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lana.Dope.Rey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rosendo-Mateu-Olfactive-Expressions/Rosendo-Mateu-No-5-Floral-Amber-Sensual-Musk-46115.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46115.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rosendo Mateu N 5 Floral, Amber, Sensual Musk"title="Rosendo Mateu N 5 Floral, Amber, Sensual Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2031250ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2031250" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407630">Lana.Dope.Rey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-14">01/14/24 23:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first fragrance from the house of Coach. I bought it out of curiosity for the rare scent of kiwi in perfumes. The initial spray immediately reminded me of Luna Rossa Carbon or a toned-down Sauvage EDP. I got it 100ml for USD 35, and I find it to be very much worth the price. <br />
<br />
The scent opens with a fruity note, followed by the distinctive aroma of bergamot and a drydown that, in my opinion, leans slightly soapy. The projection and sillage, I would say, are average; you might need to reapply after 3-4 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2031250"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2031250#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029463" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its not very strong say you may need to spray 3-5 times. I would give it an overall 8/10!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2029463"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2029463#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2029342" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MS10"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958595"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958595.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MS10" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81391.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coach Green"title="Coach Green"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2029342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2029342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958595">MS10</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-12">01/12/24 20:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with JillJill84. I totally get a blast of Irish spring soap in the opening. I think it is overpriced at retailers but ok at discounters. Love the bottle though<br />
<br />
<br />
Update: I really dont know if they changed it but I am getting less of that Irish spring smell and getting more of a citrus hint! I really like it now and starting to wear it more. I think I just needed to get used of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2029342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2029342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020825" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2020825" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDogfatherHTX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDogfatherHTX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pacific-Chill-81423.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81423.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pacific Chill"title="Pacific Chill"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2020825ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2020825" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841">TheDogfatherHTX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-04">01/04/24 23:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested this one during one of my walk-abouts at Macy's. This was a "love at first sniff" situation, and I knew I had to have this one in my collection. I waited until I found a good deal on it at a discounter and pulled the trigger. Read on to find out how that went;<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
Opening is fruity, fresh, and aromatic. The primary notes I get are kiwi, bergamot, rosemary, and cedar. The strongest of these are the kiwi and bergamot for a fruity blast that almost smells edible, followed by the rosemary and cedar for a fresh, aromatic nuance with a woody backbone. The kiwi really stands out as a unique fruit note and plays very well with the rest of the notes. The dry down is fruity, woody, and fresh. The primary notes are kiwi, cedar, and moss. The strongest of the notes are the kiwi and cedar providing a fruity and woody profile, followed by the oakmoss for an earthy but somewhat fresh and musky note.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Initial projection is strong at around 6 feet. Sillage matches that strength with an easily noticeable scent trail. After 3 hours the projection was under 12 inches with a slightly noticeable scent trail. The fragrance was a skin scent soon after.<br />
<br />
When to wear:<br />
This is a spring/summer fragrance most suited for daytime wear. This could work for office wear if you go a little lighter on the sprays. I wouldn't classify this as a date night scent, however.<br />
<br />
Blind buy:<br />
If you like fruit-centric fragrances this is a safe blind buy for you.<br />
<br />
Final verdict:<br />
I really love the scent profile of this fragrance. The kiwi note is very prominent and gives this fragrance a uniqueness that none of my other spring/summer scents have. The only disappointment about this is the performance. "Freshies" aren't known for being particularly strong or long-lasting, but I would like to have seen more than a few hours of good performance. The atomizer is kinda trash as well, but I digress. This will probably be one I reach for when I'm at home and can easily re-apply and just enjoy the fragrance myself.<br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10<br />
Longevity: 5/10<br />
Sillage: 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2020825"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2020825#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017711" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017711" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Swashbuckler9x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399990"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1399990.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Swashbuckler9x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017711ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017711" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); <br />
Interesting blend, something original but I can see myself getting mad bored of this after a couple of wearings.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2017711"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2017711#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2013385" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
