padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006166" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aloms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933685"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1933685.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aloms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Lucky-48903.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48903.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Lucky"title="1 Million Lucky"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006166ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006166" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933685">aloms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-20">12/20/23 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I personally feel this fragrance is really solid especially if your just starting, this could be used every single hot day of the year and I wouldn't get too bored of it. I recently bought it and I have gotten a few compliments but I do notice that the longevity and projection is really weak especially on my skin, its like I can't even smell it after 1 hour after applying. Its good for people that want a skin smell and for occasions you wouldn't want everyone to smell you. For me its versatile, I just wouldn't use it out to go on a date. It's very masculine at the start but after the dry down I could see some women using it. Solid 8/10 especially if you are young and just using it for school, nothing to stand out too much but I definetely am in love with the scent, just the longevity, sillage and projection aren't that good compared to other fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; This is probably gonna be a love it or hate it for most people, as it's not as generically people pleasing as a lot of scents.  To me, it smells more old school - basically a mix of shaving cream and your favorite old school green aftershave.  Very masculine, good longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2004373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2004373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not saying this because its coach and cheap. Smells like a fresh soap but not that fresh as a cologne. Cool bottle tho</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2002352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2002352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2001264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2001264" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OAKESKINEN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1914030"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OAKESKINEN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2001264ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2001264" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1914030">OAKESKINEN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-14">12/14/23 12:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this a lot. You really can smell the uplifting freshness of kiwi and a little citrus note. Haven't tested on skin tho. I love the original and this is nearly as good as it. This is definetly more youthful and better for hot days. Don't think this would be grate for fall, winter or night time use. A bottle worthy lovely scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2001264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2001264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996008" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996008" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragrantJosh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640845"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1640845.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragrantJosh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996008ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996008" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640845">FragrantJosh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-08">12/08/23 11:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My SOTD Coach Green wow! I sprayed this at approximately 6:30 am and it is now 18:46 pm and it is still there as a skin scent. I sprayed this for the first time on holiday because the beautiful bottle with the gradient drew me in. Bang! The kiwi note hits hard and it's very fresh, salty and realistic, it stays for the duration of the fragrance but gets weaker as the other notes push forward creating a very sexy alluring scent that is very mass appealing but not generic, to me this is very different and the kiwi note really does make this fragrance stand out. This fragrance definitely radiates and creates a nice neat little bubble around you and is not too strong for anyone or the wearer even with multiple sprays. Spraying this definitely makes me reminisce about being in Gran Canaria or La Palma walking down the little streets in the city, Las Palmas and Santa Cruz. Coach green can be worn all year round and is definitely suited best for going out for a drink or hitting the club, but can be a nice clean fresh scent for the office. This is definitely one of my favourite fragrances as Coach have done something different and I think it's worked. The only criticism I have is the atomiser is shit.<br />
<br />
Scent 9/10<br />
Longevity 8-10hrs +<br />
</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1996008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1996008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995078" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DELTA55"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1918404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1918404.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DELTA55" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995078ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995078" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1918404">DELTA55</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 10:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this cologne for the spring and summer. I love the kiwi in it. 8.4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1995078"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1995078#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988553" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JillJill84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314932"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1314932.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JillJill84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988553ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988553" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314932">JillJill84</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a woman, I love this cologne! It reminds me of Irish Spring soap but in a deeper more sophisticated way. It's not to overpowering smells clean without being too light.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1988553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1988553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1982470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1982470" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spritzspritz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1491588"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1491588.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spritzspritz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1982470ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1982470" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1491588">spritzspritz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-22">11/22/23 03:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the kiwi shampoo opening. Reminds me of that trendy brand of hand soaps in the early aughts: Fa. The dry down is kind of a soapy mossy cedar but I don't find it similar to Sauvage. I think it's closer to the dry down of Polo Green but they have vastly different openings so I don't consider them siblings or even cousins. <br />
I really wanted my husband to like this as much as I do! He praised the fruity opening but was hoping it would get less soapy over time, and of course the opposite happened. Not a scrubber by any means, but he's not interested in wearing it again. Meanwhile I was catching whiffs coming off him and kept asking for his arm so I can smell more of it.<br />
I'm always down for a greenish freshie and if it didn't turn more masculine after the opening, I'd gladly wear it myself. Hmmm what if I just layered something lighter when the masc dry down hits? </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1982470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1982470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1976828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195815">mikestro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-14">11/14/23 16:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Only tested in the store, two sprays top of my hand.  Soapy, sweet, fruity and green. I'm getting sweet sprucey vibes also.   The bergamot and kiwi (I guess) giving it that one-two punch of fruity sweet and citrus.  Does remind me of a tamer sauvage without strong ambroxan and pepper.   I think I like this enough to purchase a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1976828"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1976828#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1968191" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But man all I get from this is laundry detergent. Fresh laundry smells good though and it's always nice to smell good, i guess... but yeah, this thing knocks greenley out of the water and beats it's corpse and then harvests it's organs.<br />
<br />
Lasts about one hour, maybe two on a labrador.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1968191"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1968191#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1963224" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I already have the platinum and I like it but havent been wearing it much , maybe 10 ml in 2 years. I thought maybe this one good as It has a lot of good reviews and its green which is kind of my fave at the moment. But this is smell like cheap smelling Dior sauvage with horrendous performance. I literally cant smell it after 15 mins with 7 sprays.( and no Im not nose blind by it). Imagine you bought a kiwi soap in a dollar tree...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1960837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1960837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1960023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1960023" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="c3noid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1863121"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1863121.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="c3noid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1960023ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1960023" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1863121">c3noid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-24">10/24/23 18:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach Green for Men is undeniably a fantastic cologne, a fragrance that encapsulates an alluring combination of sophistication, masculinity, and freshness. This cologne, part of the Coach brand's fragrance line, has become a popular choice for those seeking a distinctive and captivating scent. The appeal of Coach Green for Men lies in its unique blend of notes, longevity, and versatility that make it a top pick among cologne enthusiasts.<br />
<br />
One of the key factors that contribute to Coach Green's acclaim is its well-balanced and harmonious composition of fragrance notes. When you first experience this cologne, you are greeted by invigorating top notes that are fresh and zesty. The citrusy and herbal notes in the opening create an immediate sense of freshness that is perfect for everyday wear. This initial burst is often described as an olfactory awakening, setting a positive tone for the day ahead. The inclusion of crisp and vibrant citrus notes, such as bergamot and lime, is especially appealing, as it adds a refreshing and energetic quality to the fragrance.<br />
<br />
As Coach Green's initial freshness begins to settle, the heart notes make their presence known. These heart notes introduce a subtle complexity to the fragrance, transitioning from the invigorating opening into a warm and sophisticated core. The presence of aromatic notes like lavender and coriander is skillfully blended with the soft and floral hint of geranium. These heart notes lend Coach Green for Men an air of refinement and versatility. It's a fragrance that can seamlessly transition from a casual day at the office to an evening out with friends, demonstrating its adaptability for various occasions.<br />
<br />
The base notes of Coach Green are equally noteworthy, as they provide depth and longevity to the cologne. With a rich and woody foundation, the fragrance resonates with a sense of strength and masculinity. The inclusion of notes like suede, amber, and oakmoss contributes to the cologne's longevity, ensuring that it remains present and appealing throughout the day. The dry down of Coach Green is where the scent truly becomes distinctive, leaving a memorable and intriguing trail that lingers in the air. This longevity ensures that you don't need to continually reapply the cologne, making it both convenient and cost-effective.<br />
<br />
Coach Green for Men distinguishes itself not only through its fragrance composition but also through its versatility. This cologne has the remarkable ability to be worn in various settings and seasons, making it an excellent choice for any man's fragrance collection. Its fresh and zesty opening notes are perfect for spring and summer, evoking the sensation of a warm breeze on a sunny day. As the cologne evolves into its heart and base notes, it becomes a versatile choice for the cooler months of autumn and winter. This adaptability means that Coach Green can accompany you through the changing seasons, making it a reliable signature scent that suits any time of year.<br />
<br />
Moreover, Coach Green is a cologne that is well-received by people of all ages. Its versatility extends to its demographic appeal, making it an excellent choice for men of different age groups. Whether you're a young professional looking to make a great impression at work or a mature gentleman who appreciates a timeless and masculine scent, Coach Green for Men caters to a wide range of preferences.<br />
<br />
A notable feature of Coach Green for Men is its ability to strike a balance between being distinctive and not overpowering. The fragrance is memorable, leaving a lasting impression on those around you, but it does so without being excessively strong or overwhelming. This makes it an excellent choice for both formal and casual settings. Whether you're attending a business meeting, a romantic dinner, or a casual gathering, Coach Green complements your style without dominating the atmosphere. It offers an air of sophistication and elegance, ensuring you leave a positive impression wherever you go.<br />
<br />
Coach Green's bottle design also mirrors the essence of the fragrance itself. It is simple yet elegant, with a clean, green-tinted bottle and the iconic Coach logo embossed on it. The bottle's design is a reflection of the cologne's understated elegance and its ability to convey a sense of style and refinement. It's a bottle you'll be proud to display on your dresser or bring with you while traveling.<br />
<br />
In conclusion, Coach Green for Men is an exceptional cologne that excels in several aspects. Its well-crafted fragrance composition, blending fresh, aromatic, and woody notes, ensures an appealing and versatile scent. The cologne's ability to adapt to different seasons and occasions, as well as its broad demographic appeal, makes it an excellent choice for men of all ages. Coach Green's unique balance of being memorable without being overpowering ensures that you leave a lasting impression without overwhelming those around you. Additionally, the bottle design exemplifies the fragrance's elegance and style. When you choose Coach Green for Men, you're not just selecting a cologne; you're making a statement of sophistication and confidence. This cologne embodies the essence of a modern gentleman, making it a fragrance that enhances your presence and leaves an enduring impression.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1960023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1960023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1958405" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1958405" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zanerkand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1578959"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1578959.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zanerkand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1958405ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1958405" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1578959">Zanerkand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-22">10/22/23 14:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Something unique, finally! The vast majority of fragrances are very pleasant but smell fairly similar because they're designed to mass appealing. (can you think of anything that's outright horrible?) So to find something that stands out is a nice surprise.<br />
<br />
The kiwi note is absolutely beautiful. Very strong and distinctive.<br />
<br />
It dries down into a standard blue fragrance but as stated above that's not a bad thing.<br />
<br />
Moderate projection and longevity (Savage and Prada Carbon last longer) but this is cheaper so you can overspray.<br />
<br />
8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1958405"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1958405#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1957296" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Salute!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1948966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1948966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1948954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1948954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1948954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942129" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1942129" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="XOXO_marcel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1571392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="XOXO_marcel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tous/Tous-Gems-Party-66524.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66524.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tous Gems Party"title="Tous Gems Party"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1942129ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1942129" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571392">XOXO_marcel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-01">10/01/23 20:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is nice! Gel-like, sort of shampooey and refreshing. Makes me think of summer at the pool. The geranium is very "green" and helps it stand it from some of the other new releases I've seen this year; at the same time, it's linear and inoffensive enough that no one will find it "strange". <br />
<br />
Great release from Coach!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1942129"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1942129#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1931363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1931363" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Richcip"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113016"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1113016.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Richcip" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Tobacco-Collection-Rich-Warm-Addictive-2021-69134.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69134.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Collection Rich Warm Addictive 2021"title="Tobacco Collection Rich Warm Addictive 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1931363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1931363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113016">Richcip</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-18">09/18/23 18:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm so pleasantly surprised by this. It was my anniversary yesterday and my wife asked me to put together a list of frags I want but don't have. I put this one somewhere in the middle of the list based on some good things I've read, but had no idea what she was going to come home with.  When I opened the bag, I saw that green box and knew right away. Sne pretty much sampled them all and this is what she picked. And let me tell you, she did well. The opening is so bright and unique, and I get some old school piney polo green OG vibes on the dry down. No it doesn't smell like polo green, but it definitely gives off a hint of the vibe as it progresses. Good longevity, I'm impressed, this one is a keeper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1931363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1931363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1930977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930977" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fanzypants"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/48578"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.48578.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fanzypants" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/La-Nuit-de-L-Homme-Bleu-Electrique-67997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit de L'Homme Bleu lectrique"title="La Nuit de L'Homme Bleu lectrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930977ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930977" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/48578">fanzypants</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-18">09/18/23 09:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Looks like Coach subbed in Salamagne for Jovanovic on this one and I'm loving the fresh play. <br />
Coach Green opens up fruity and fresh with a lot of piney notes and some beautiful floral notes in the background keeping it super smooth. <br />
The fruity notes evaporate within the first hour and the geranium and cedar blend really well together to give a nice old school shaving cream vibe which is really nice and fitting for so many situations.  After the 4 hour mark it loses some potency but hangs around a bit longer on clothes.  Overall this is a pretty awesome fragrance. <br />
On me, Coach Green is very close to the Sauvage DNA and it distinguishes itself by using fruity and piney notes.  I like it better than Coach Platinum, and Ajmal Zeal which also smell similar.  The piney notes pull it towards the L'Insoumis and Rochas Aromatic profile which I really appreciate.  Great scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1930977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1930977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1926674" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1926674" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Spasticink"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/969028"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Spasticink" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/CH-Men-6759.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6759.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CH Men"title="CH Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1926674ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1926674" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/969028">Spasticink</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-13">09/13/23 02:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another kind of boring, generic 'sauvage-like' scent with some minor nuances from H24 in the opening. Mediocre projection, after 30min it's a skin scent. Base is woody herbal mossy.<br />
If you own any of popular 'shower gel scents' (Sauvage, Dylan, Prada Carbon) just skip it, it's totally redundant and by any means NOT SIMILAR to Gisada Ambassador AT ALL as some dumb stated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1926674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1926674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1922129" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814288">Haapis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-07">09/07/23 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this one!! The kiwi in the top notes gives it a refreshing and bright opening, as well as uniqueness. Good longevity, strong enough but not too much, and great freshness for three seasons (I might pass on this one during Winter). Super excited to wear this more often during Fall!<br />
<br />
Edit: I've noticed it really does have similarities to Luna Rossa Carbon by Prada</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1922129"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1922129#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1921762" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Zdecydowanie, nie warto.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1921762"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1921762#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1917198" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1917198" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dolcethadon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/248173"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.248173.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dolcethadon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1917198ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1917198" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/248173">dolcethadon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-01">09/01/23 12:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The beautiful Coach Green bottle caught my eye at Ulta so I tested it out on paper, this is my first impression. Coach Green opens up very fresh, fruity &amp; uber modern. A kiwi accord is immediately noticeable but the scent quickly began to morph into an ambroxan bomb very reminiscent of Dior Sauvage or Prada Luna Rossa Carbon, yet green. I'm sure this fragrance will get compliments, it's quite pleasant but also very typical for men's fragrance of recent years. I can however see this fragrance possibly being more distinct on skin. Might give it another try eventually.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1917198"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1917198#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1914918" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1914918" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sammEslappa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747606"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1747606.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sammEslappa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Pegasus-16938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pegasus"title="Pegasus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1914918ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1914918" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747606">sammEslappa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-29">08/29/23 20:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>was way too harsh on this in my initial review. a cool little aromatic gem reminiscent of barbershop style fragrances. Though theyre not directly comparable, Ill still say Its sort of like a fruitier Prada carbon. The kiwi does great in the opening and carries into the drydown with more emphasis on spicy aromatics. A pretty unique release that i was pleasantly surprised by, especially for the price online. performs exceptionally well, other people around me have enjoyed it as much as I have</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1914918"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1914918#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1906557" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1906557" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pilotdc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587795"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1587795.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pilotdc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1906557ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1906557" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587795">pilotdc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-19">08/19/23 20:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach green stands on its own. The proof is in the 'reminds me of' section where it smells like none of them except maaaybe Greenly. This is sweet, fruity, and woody. The opening reminds me of Jolly Ranchers cuz it's sweet like candy, and that vibe sticks around in the mid where more of the bitter notes come out. <br />
I like Coach Green but I probably wouldn't pay more than $50 for 100ml. It is special, but not great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1906557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1906557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1905539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1905539" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Npreen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738043"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1738043.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Npreen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1905539ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1905539" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738043">Npreen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-18">08/18/23 15:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't understand the comparisons to sauvage or plr carbon at all, not even close, people really comparing anything with bergomot to sauvage like how they compare anything with Pineapple to aventus... this is a wonderful scent that's different from almost everything else. Its a green type of scent, with a sweet fruity opening, and later in the drydown, reminds me of a slightly fresher platinum egoiste drydown... love it. Just wish it would either last or project better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1905539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1905539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1902091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1902091" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="crlneria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1713240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="crlneria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1902091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1902091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); <br />
Update: just for the nasty perfume snobs who keep saying idk how people are getting Prada Carbon or sauvage blah blah.. uhm different people smell things differently Ive been in perfume for 14years and think I have a pretty keen nose.. its just what I perceived just like others who stated it doesnt smell like whats on the remind me of but go in to list something else.. you dont have to be nasty its just perfume.. and apparently enough people thought the same for it to be top of the list.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
