padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1896070" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ZephyrDavid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689596"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1689596.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ZephyrDavid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tommy-Hilfiger/Impact-Intense-67365.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67365.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Impact Intense"title="Impact Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1896070ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1896070" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689596">ZephyrDavid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-07">08/07/23 04:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a really great fresh spicy aromatic fragrance.<br />
<br />
NOT similar to Prada Carbon or any of the Dior Sauvage line.<br />
Its 95% similar to Carolina Herrera Bad Boy Cobalt but greener and brighter. Smells like Cobalt better version!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1896070"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1896070#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1893159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1893159" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dabatch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1112358.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dabatch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mercedes-Benz/Mercedes-Benz-Sign-Your-Attitude-75488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mercedes-Benz Sign Your Attitude"title="Mercedes-Benz Sign Your Attitude"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1893159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1893159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112358">dabatch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-03">08/03/23 06:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>one of the best if not the best this years release.<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1893159"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1893159#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1892567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1892567" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="murovian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1023409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1023409.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="murovian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/Fusion-d-Issey-61866.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61866.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fusion d'Issey"title="Fusion d'Issey"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1892567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1892567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1023409">murovian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-02">08/02/23 09:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's been some time since I've fell for something and especially felt immersed and smitten by the frag from the first sniff. Initially, when I was about to purchase it, the seller asked if I was sure about it and let me get some time do evaluate my decision. 40 minutes later I stood back in store strongly decided that I need this fragrance in my life and I cannot express how fresh it feels. <br />
<br />
The olfactory pyramid  is pretty much exact. Deep green hue of kiwi juice blast protrudes right off the bat and it is not your standard five-minutes-and-all-gone opening. The head of the fragrance is the proper head that tells the heart what it is supposed to do. To get a better idea, imagine a cold metallic spoon delving into fresh kiwi pulp. Once you get to skin, it turns into rather powdery, earthy tone with almost bare freshness it initially had. It's somehow heavier and dense, yet still easily wearable and cheeringful. <br />
<br />
<br />
As I am having my current Balmain/Safari trance moment this summer, this is exactly what I needed to complete that fantasy in my head. And I can already attest for sure, looking into future, I am not gonna regret this addition in my closet. This was simply an immediate jump to my top five. <br />
<br />
<br />
I never thought of buying a scent from Coach and even nose behind it would not convince me to do so. But here I am, hundred percent satisfied with it. So if there is a chance to get it, put your hands on it til it's hot stuff for such a reasonable pricing. Worth every single nickel.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1892567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1892567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1891468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1891468" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Irvdaman15$"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1333034"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1333034.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Irvdaman15$" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lacoste-Fragrances/Eau-de-Lacoste-L-12-12-Yellow-Jaune-28608.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28608.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Lacoste L.12.12 Yellow (Jaune)"title="Eau de Lacoste L.12.12 Yellow (Jaune)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1891468ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1891468" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1333034">Irvdaman15$</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 20:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a powdery polo green mixed with the coach platinum dna. <br />
Overall very nice and would love to get a bottle one day as its a very enjoyable fragrance to wear. <br />
8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1891468"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1891468#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1891188" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1891188" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="caifan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/939475"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.939475.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="caifan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-The-Scent-Private-Accord-50874.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50874.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss The Scent Private Accord"title="Boss The Scent Private Accord"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1891188ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1891188" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/939475">caifan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 12:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coach Green is a fresh, aromatic, herbal and woody fragrance.<br />
<br />
The opening aroma is citrusy and fresh, I perceive more bergamot than kiwi, plus some herbal notes that make a nice combination. Minutes later the aroma becomes more aromatic, with a good dose of ambroxan and also some Fougere elements such as geranium and moss, this phase is the one I like the most since the aroma is very attractive to me. Once it has reached its drying phase, it continues to maintain the herbal sensation, but with some woody and mossy chords.<br />
<br />
Coach Green is a fragrance to use all year round, in any season and in any situation, mainly for daytime activities, maybe not so suitable for formal or special occasions, but that's just my perception, but what is beyond doubt It is that it is very versatile.<br />
<br />
Its longevity is between 6 to 8 hrs. with good sillage the first two hours.<br />
<br />
Its smell is attractive and masculine, I saw that some compare it with Sauvage and also with Legend de Montblanc and there is something true, I really liked its smell, and I hope to buy a bottle soon. Of the entire line, the first Coach seems to me to be the most original in terms of aroma, but this Green is a good fragrance too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1891188"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1891188#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1891134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1891134" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SgtButtCheeks"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580700"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580700.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SgtButtCheeks" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1891134ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1891134" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580700">SgtButtCheeks</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 10:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If Polo (the original green one) and and Cool Water had a baby and that baby grew up and made sweet, sweet love to Dior Sauvage EDT, the love child would be Coach Green.  It would smell amazing but would perform like actual baby poop.  <br />
That's not a deal breaker for me.  I've usually got a travel sprayer of whatever cologne I'm wearing with me at all times. <br />
Its not very complex...six notes listed so it flies right thru the top and middle.<br />
The ending is where it's at its best.  Its basically a fruity, less obnoxious Sauvage.  <br />
Very casual.  Nothing super daring.  Jeremy Fragrance says he likes it so that's all you needed to know to go run out and buy a huge bottle :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1891134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1891134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1889061" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1878168" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steve907"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672974"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steve907" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Profumo-34761.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34761.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Profumo"title="Armani Code Profumo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1878168ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1878168" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672974">Steve907</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-13">07/13/23 18:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hard to believe the note breakdown is accurate. This reminds me of Polo the original. Very manly, very forestesque. In my opinion a winter scent, or maybe a cool fall cause one spray and this stuff is projecting. It's potent as of the original formulation. I'm glad I tried it because I was hoping for something fresher and green but this is like Mont Blanc Legend. I'd say this is an older guys cologne.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1878168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1878168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1876064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1876064" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BGBG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BGBG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Visit-For-Men-598.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.598.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Visit For Men"title="Visit For Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1876064ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1876064" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294277">BGBG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-11">07/11/23 05:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The best in the line so far.<br />
It is a kind of sweet and green version of Sauvage or Luna Rossa Carbon.<br />
Aromatic bitter touches combined with sweet tonka.<br />
Moss and geranium gives it a classic vibe that differenciates it from the rest.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1876064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1876064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1875700" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1875700" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MountainDewd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662380"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1662380.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MountainDewd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Eau-de-Parfum-37735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"title="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1875700ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1875700" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662380">MountainDewd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-10">07/10/23 15:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got it yesterday and put it on today, while not bad scent at all, I am slightly disappointed, smells like the middleman between Sauvage and Prada Luna Rosa carbon, I also dont pick out the sweetness of the kiwi as much as I wouldve wanted. Overall, a good safe scent, 4-5 hour longevity, skin scent after 2 hours</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1875700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1875700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1874151" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I think its great. I do get the kiwi quite prominently in the opening. Super versatile. Not pushing the envelope in any way, but thats not the point. It smells great, preforms fine, and you can wear it anytime, anywhere. Signature scent worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1864904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1864904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1862942" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258487">Andras91</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-23">06/23/23 03:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>very soapy, I was waiting for the fruity kiwi note, I'm still waiting for it, 80s face alcohol, disappointing, not good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1862678"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1862678#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1861714" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1861714" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DaveB413"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1547819"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1547819.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DaveB413" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Paradise Garden"title="Le Beau Paradise Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1861714ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1861714" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1547819">DaveB413</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-21">06/21/23 15:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Let me start off by saying I am a huge fan of PDM Greenley, just not a fan of the price or performance. So when I heard this getting compared to that, I HAD to try it. But I know from past experiences (Coach Blue) not to trust Coach. The top notes smells great, but the dry down is meh at best. Same with this one. It doesn't smell like Greenley. Right off the top it smells like Coach blue but with more green notes, but that only lasts about 2 minutes and then it immediately becomes Prada Luna Rossa Carbon, which I hate. Believe the reviews when people call this the green Sauvage - that's what it is, except the green isn't there for more than 5 minutes. For a new release, this is bad. Not as bas as Gisada Ambassador which it gets compared to, but still bad for a new release. Tweaking/doing a top note to Dior Sauvage is lame and outdated. Try something new! So glad I didn't buy a full bottle. Beginner noses and the masses might like this, but if you're in the fragcom, you will not be impressed. At all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1861714"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1861714#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1861657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1861657" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RhettB27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345688"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345688.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RhettB27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/John-Varvatos/Artisan-Pure-46623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Artisan Pure"title="Artisan Pure"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1861657ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1861657" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345688">RhettB27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-21">06/21/23 14:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impressions are overall very positive! Cant seem to figure out what exactly its reminding me of but definitely very clean and a little soapy to start, almost pretty in a way. The rosemary giving a little minty herbal touch. Drying with the oakmoss coming out more and moreactually reminding me of the way Greenley executes its oakmoss. Amazing greenness layered with a nice fruity kiwi note, which I noticed Coach likes to do with its other frags incorporating an enticing sweet note layered in the compositions. Really solid stuff but may also underwhelm many. I find it really pleasant idk about a FB though<br />
<br />
Edit 12/30: I did find out what this frag reminds me of and it really didnt take long, smell coach Green next to Mont Blanc Legend or D&amp;G Light Blue. That oakmoss accord is spot on! I almost got them confused finding an unmarked blotter card thinking it was the two latter frags when it was actually the Green.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1861657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1861657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1859267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1859267" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emil1724"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1680861"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="emil1724" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pantomime/Act-5-91124.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91124.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Act 5"title="Act 5"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1859267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1859267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1680861">emil1724</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-18">06/18/23 13:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the opening is very nice with lots of green apple, but the dry down smells like a moist bathroom at a fitness center</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1859267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1859267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1853370" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steven221283"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steven221283" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1853370ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1853370" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486">Steven221283</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-10">06/10/23 10:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really not a fan of this one. The first 20 seconds or so isn't too bad, smells a bit apple like rather than kiwi. Absolutely nothing like the apple in Greenley though and the similarities end at the fact that Greenley has apple in and this smells like it does. Anyone saying this smells like Greenley is kidding themselves to be honest, it's a mile off it. This is aromatic and the drydown smells like a deodorant more than an aftershave, in a similar way to Percival and A&amp;C Fierce (although it doesn't smell like those). Anyway, no, this isn't good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1853370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1853370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849362" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1849362" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dina France"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1549379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1549379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dina France" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valmont/Blu-Cobalto-I-49424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blu Cobalto I"title="Blu Cobalto I"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1849362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1849362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1549379">Dina France</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-05">06/05/23 03:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a woman and I got a sample because I was curious about the kiwi note. It's not here :( There is not even a sour citrusy touch to imitate anything like kiwi. It's just a classical cologne type of fragrance with rosemary, geranium and dirty moss. Something you have probably smelled a 100 times. I would not wish my man to smell like this.<br />
<br />
Dina_France (perfume reviews on youtube)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1849362"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1849362#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1846732" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Tropical fruity top with Savauge dry down. I'd say Ambassador is a little stronger but once I run out of that, I'll probably buy this to replace as it will no doubt be cheaper in future.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1846075" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Toiletcrusher"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659951"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1659951.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Toiletcrusher" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1846075ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1846075" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659951">Toiletcrusher</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-31">05/31/23 14:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a 100ml tester in the mail today.<br />
<br />
If you have Coach Blue - swap out the lime for kiwi (or something like that), up the lemon/bergamot and throw in some pine needles.   To me it's almost like a very updated Polo (Green.)<br />
<br />
Fresh and inoffensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1846075"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1846075#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1845134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Absolutely Fantasic Green Fresh Summer / Spring Fragrance For Men I Received This Bottle In The Mail a Few Days Ago And I Wore It Out In The Daytime Around Noon &amp; I didnt get back home until Night &amp; My Sisters &amp; Girlfriend All Complimented Me In The Same Few Hour Span And Said I Smell Super Nice &amp; Pleasant Sillage &amp; Projection Is Morderate &amp; Lasted 6-7 Hours On My Clothes &amp; Skin <br />
<br />
<br />
Thanks Coach You Knocked It Out Of The Ball Park With This One I Also own Coach For Men , Coach Blue &amp; Coach Platinum All Wonderful Fragrances In My Opinion !!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1845134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1845134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1844188" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1844188" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leroystanks"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229958"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1229958.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="leroystanks" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floris/Jermyn-Street-32112.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32112.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jermyn Street"title="Jermyn Street"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1844188ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1844188" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229958">leroystanks</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-29">05/29/23 05:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite the exciting kiwi note, this is little more than Coachs version of Parfums De Marlys Greenley. The top is more of a muddled fruit instead of apple, but after that its the same synthetic woody and mossy dry down of Greenley. Absolutely nothing original here, and I dont think anyone was expecting it to be.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1844188"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1844188#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1843151" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1843151" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="btd069"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341525"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341525.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="btd069" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/French-Riviera-74636.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74636.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="French Riviera"title="French Riviera"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1843151ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1843151" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341525">btd069</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-27">05/27/23 15:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sauvage vibes with some fruity Kiwi up top. Smells very pleasant and not as sharp as Sauvage edt. Longevity is average, 5-6ish hours. Testers on FragranceNet right now for $48. No regrets, but nothing unique. Not worth what it will sell for at retail once its released in the US. Presentation is same and the others in the line but green gradient and tag. Mass appealing and a good deal at discount.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1843151"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1843151#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1840927" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1840927" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dixieland Delight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1442508"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1442508.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dixieland Delight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Viking-Cologne-67039.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67039.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viking Cologne"title="Viking Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1840927ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1840927" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1442508">Dixieland Delight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-24">05/24/23 14:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I understand the kiwi sauvage or carbon description. <br />
<br />
It has a little fresh water thing going on, but largely yes - kiwi sauvage. <br />
<br />
I get the ambroxan pepper soap thing here. Maybe it's the rosemary replacing the pepper but it's the vibe.<br />
<br />
Performance and projection are nowhere near sauvage or carbon.<br />
<br />
It doesn't smell cheap, but it doesn't smell super high end either.<br />
<br />
7.5 - solid fresh kiwi freshie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1840927"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1840927#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1839834" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The kiwi is a well distinguishable note I don't really see in other fragrances, which makes this a good addition to my collection. It's not something that will blow your socks off, but it's a nice summer freshy. I'm happy with this blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1839834"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1839834#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1832767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Ngc is just a typo for NPC which is clearly what he meant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1815805"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1815805#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>

    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">

align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1816436"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1816436#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1905539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1905539" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Npreen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738043"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1738043.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Npreen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1905539ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1905539" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738043">Npreen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-18">08/18/23 15:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't understand the comparisons to sauvage or plr carbon at all, not even close, people really comparing anything with bergomot to sauvage like how they compare anything with Pineapple to aventus... this is a wonderful scent that's different from almost everything else. Its a green type of scent, with a sweet fruity opening, and later in the drydown, reminds me of a slightly fresher platinum egoiste drydown... love it. Just wish it would either last or project better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1905539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1905539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1931363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1931363" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Richcip"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113016"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1113016.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Richcip" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Tobacco-Collection-Rich-Warm-Addictive-2021-69134.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69134.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Collection Rich Warm Addictive 2021"title="Tobacco Collection Rich Warm Addictive 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1931363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1931363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113016">Richcip</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-18">09/18/23 18:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm so pleasantly surprised by this. It was my anniversary yesterday and my wife asked me to put together a list of frags I want but don't have. I put this one somewhere in the middle of the list based on some good things I've read, but had no idea what she was going to come home with.  When I opened the bag, I saw that green box and knew right away. Sne pretty much sampled them all and this is what she picked. And let me tell you, she did well. The opening is so bright and unique, and I get some old school piney polo green OG vibes on the dry down. No it doesn't smell like polo green, but it definitely gives off a hint of the vibe as it progresses. Good longevity, I'm impressed, this one is a keeper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1931363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1931363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1864904" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/626694">joshuabrian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-26">06/26/23 09:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont get the hate for this one. I think its great. I do get the kiwi quite prominently in the opening. Super versatile. Not pushing the envelope in any way, but thats not the point. It smells great, preforms fine, and you can wear it anytime, anywhere. Signature scent worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1864904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1864904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1899765" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1899765" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AmoreProfumi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/170873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.170873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AmoreProfumi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1899765ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1899765" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/170873">AmoreProfumi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-11">08/11/23 13:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really liking this one, I get Prada carbon vibes only even fresher and cleaner with an added soapy zest or Irish spring undertone, it has that gentleman vibe slightly maturer but think it be good for 25+ or if you like scents like Prada carbon sauvage Dylan blue etc.. and that bottle looks great in the green, gonna keep this in mind for a future new scent.<br />
<br />
Update: just for the nasty perfume snobs who keep saying idk how people are getting Prada Carbon or sauvage blah blah.. uhm different people smell things differently Ive been in perfume for 14years and think I have a pretty keen nose.. its just what I perceived just like others who stated it doesnt smell like whats on the remind me of but go in to list something else.. you dont have to be nasty its just perfume.. and apparently enough people thought the same for it to be top of the list.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1899765"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1899765#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="81391" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
