</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1861714" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1861714" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DaveB413"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1547819"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1547819.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DaveB413" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Paradise-Garden-88836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Paradise Garden"title="Le Beau Paradise Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1861714ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1861714" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1547819">DaveB413</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-21">06/21/23 15:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Let me start off by saying I am a huge fan of PDM Greenley, just not a fan of the price or performance. So when I heard this getting compared to that, I HAD to try it. But I know from past experiences (Coach Blue) not to trust Coach. The top notes smells great, but the dry down is meh at best. Same with this one. It doesn't smell like Greenley. Right off the top it smells like Coach blue but with more green notes, but that only lasts about 2 minutes and then it immediately becomes Prada Luna Rossa Carbon, which I hate. Believe the reviews when people call this the green Sauvage - that's what it is, except the green isn't there for more than 5 minutes. For a new release, this is bad. Not as bas as Gisada Ambassador which it gets compared to, but still bad for a new release. Tweaking/doing a top note to Dior Sauvage is lame and outdated. Try something new! So glad I didn't buy a full bottle. Beginner noses and the masses might like this, but if you're in the fragcom, you will not be impressed. At all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1861714"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1861714#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049562" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ViceCity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478914"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1478914.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ViceCity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Abercrombie-Fitch/First-Instinct-37753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="First Instinct"title="First Instinct"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478914">ViceCity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-01">02/01/24 22:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening notes are superb. Then, as is unfortunately all too often the case with this brand, that first burst of freshness is not sustained. Weak longevity, within 30 min-1 hour one can expect it to begin smelling like medicine.<br />
<br />
A trial that reminded me just why I'm not buying Coach fragrances anymore, even if they remain remarkably affordable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2049562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2049562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087712" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2087712" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blkleather_redlace"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078454"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1078454.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blkleather_redlace" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Feminite-du-Bois-5749.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5749.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Feminit du Bois"title="Feminit du Bois"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2087712ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2087712" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078454">blkleather_redlace</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-09">03/09/24 21:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bargain barrel aquatic woody axe bilge.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="2087712"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=2087712#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849362" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1849362" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dina France"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1549379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1549379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dina France" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valmont/Blu-Cobalto-I-49424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blu Cobalto I"title="Blu Cobalto I"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1849362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1849362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1549379">Dina France</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-05">06/05/23 03:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a woman and I got a sample because I was curious about the kiwi note. It's not here :( There is not even a sour citrusy touch to imitate anything like kiwi. It's just a classical cologne type of fragrance with rosemary, geranium and dirty moss. Something you have probably smelled a 100 times. I would not wish my man to smell like this.<br />
<br />
Dina_France (perfume reviews on youtube)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1849362"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1849362#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1862678" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1862678" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andras91"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1258487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andras91" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-L-Intense-49416.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49416.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme Idal L'Intense"title="L'Homme Idal L'Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1862678ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1862678" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258487">Andras91</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-23">06/23/23 03:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>very soapy, I was waiting for the fruity kiwi note, I'm still waiting for it, 80s face alcohol, disappointing, not good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="81391"comment_id="1862678"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Green-81391.html?ccid=1862678#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="81391" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Givenchy.html" class="en2inter">Givenchy</a>
        </span>
    </div>

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">20.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>
    </div>
            </div>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
